includeCredit.description: A boolean value whether to include credits in the cost budget. Defaults to `true`

includeDiscount.description: Whether a budget includes discounts. Defaults to `true`

includeOtherSubscription.description: A boolean value whether to include other subscription costs in the cost budget. Defaults to `true`

includeRecurring.description: A boolean value whether to include recurring costs in the cost budget. Defaults to `true`

includeRefund.description: A boolean value whether to include refunds in the cost budget. Defaults to `true`

includeSubscription.description: A boolean value whether to include subscriptions in the cost budget. Defaults to `true`

includeSupport.description: A boolean value whether to include support costs in the cost budget. Defaults to `true`

includeTax.description: A boolean value whether to include tax in the cost budget. Defaults to `true`

includeUpfront.description: A boolean value whether to include upfront costs in the cost budget. Defaults to `true`

useAmortized.description: Whether a budget uses the amortized rate. Defaults to `false`

useBlended.description: A boolean value whether to use blended costs in the cost budget. Defaults to `false`
